outputMessages.noReleaseNotesSourceError: Please enter the source you which to use to generate release notes (message or pr)
outputMessages.incorrectReleaseNotesSourceError: Please enter a valid release notes source (message or pr)
outputMessages.noReleaseNotesModeError: Please enter which release notes mode you want for PRs (short or full)
outputMessages.incorrectReleaseNotesModeError: Please enter a valid release notes mode (short or full)
outputMessages.noGithubTokenError: Please enter a GitHub token to be able to make authenticated requests to the GitHub API
outputMessages.noReleaseStartReferenceError: Please enter a git reference (commit SHA or tag name) that references the commit directly before the first commit in the new release, for example, the tag name of the previous release
outputMessages.noReleaseEndReferenceError: Please enter a git reference (commit SHA or tag name) that references the commit that *ends* this release's commit messages
outputMessages.githubApiRateLimitExceededError: Rate limit exceeded while making requests to the GitHub API. Additional information:
outputMessages.githubApiUnauthorizedAccessError: Unauthorized access to the GitHub API, usually due to an incorrect GitHub token. Additional information:
outputMessages.githubApiBadRequestError: Bad request to the GitHub API. Additional information:
outputMessages.githubApiUnableToMakeRequestError: Unable to make request to the GitHub API, check internet connection
outputMessages.githubApiLibcurlError: Error initializing libcurl to make requests to the GitHub API
outputMessages.gitLogError: Unable to run and read the git log command output
outputMessages.markdownFileError: Unable to create/open markdown release notes file
outputMessages.htmlFileError: Unable to create/open HTML release notes file
outputMessages.expectedSyntaxMessage:
Expected Syntax:
1 - release_notes_generator message release_start_reference release_end_reference github_token
2 - release_notes_generator pr release_start_reference release_end_reference github_token short/full
